His achievements are quite admirable even without knowing with whom he studied.

Indeed, but I

hear his mentor is named Henslow.

Well, if it isn’t Henslow! It’s been

a while.

Se-Sedgwick!

Henslow?

I think I’ve seen it all, boasting like that.

Charles is beginning to gain academic recognition.

I give up.

The seasickness is unbearable.

The Beagle headed down

the La Plata River between

Buenos Aries, Argentina,

and Montevideo, Uruguay.

Whew,

I’m

exhausted.

Aagghh!

85
